name: jsdoc-preview
description: Open a rendered version of the JSDoc docstrings in the current editor with `ctrl-shift-d`.

liveUpdate.description: Re-render the preview as the contents of the source changes, without requiring the source buffer to be saved. If disabled, the preview is re-rendered only when the buffer is saved to disk.

configFilePath.description: Defines the path to the configuration file JSDoc uses to render JSDocs

customStyleSheets.description: Defines the path(s) to custom stylesheets used in the rendering of the JSDoc preview
